summary: AsyncLocalStorage-based CancellationScopes may leak scope state in Node.js 18, potentially affecting code that uses condition() with timeouts which internally create and cancel scopes.
userImpact: Users may experience unexpected scope state persistence or context leakage when using condition() or CancellationScopes in Node.js 18.
resolutionDetails: Could not be reproduced; issue closed due to inability to confirm problem.
